extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Local Access to Driver Log Files
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that only trusted individuals have local access to the driver log files on the Recording Server.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update the software to version V13.5 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices using appropriate security mechanisms as per Siemens' guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version and secure the connected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
